feature.summary: Hotel Operations Digitalization - Room Booking & Reservation Module
feature.description: Allow hotel staff and guests to manage room availability, reservations, and guest stay lifecycle through a centralized Hotel Management System.

epics.description: Epic to handle user authentication and role-based access control for the Hotel Management System.

stories.description:
As a hotel staff member, I want to log in to the system with my credentials so that I can access booking operations based on my assigned role.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Users can log in with username and password
- System validates credentials against user database
- Admin users have full access to all booking operations
- Front Desk Staff have access to reservation and check-in/check-out operations
- Unauthorized users cannot access the system
- Session timeout after 30 minutes of inactivity

subtasks.description: Create REST API endpoint for user login with JWT token generation
Create middleware to validate user roles and permissions for different operations

subtasks.summary: Write unit tests for authentication logic
subtasks.description: Create JUnit tests for authentication service and role validation

epics.description: Epic to manage room availability display, reservation creation, and availability validation.

stories.description:
As a front desk staff member, I want to view real-time room availability based on check-in and check-out dates so that I can quickly identify available rooms for guests.

Acceptance Criteria:
- System displays all rooms with their current status (Available, Booked, Maintenance)
- Users can filter rooms by check-in and check-out dates
- Room availability updates in real-time when reservations are made or cancelled
- Display shows room type, room number, and pricing
- Rooms under maintenance are clearly marked and excluded from booking

subtasks.description: Design and implement database tables for rooms, room types, and availability status
Create service to query available rooms based on date range and room status
Create frontend component to display room availability with filters

subtasks.summary: Write integration tests for availability service
subtasks.description: Create integration tests for room availability queries and filters

stories.description:
As a front desk staff member, I want to create room reservations by selecting room type, stay duration, and entering guest details so that I can confirm bookings for guests.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Users can select room type from available options
- Users can specify check-in and check-out dates
- System captures guest details (name, contact, ID proof)
- System assigns available room of selected type
- Confirmation number is generated upon successful reservation
- Reservation details are stored in the database
- Email confirmation is sent to guest

subtasks.description: Design and implement database tables for reservations and guest information
Create REST API endpoint to handle reservation creation with validation
Create frontend form for capturing reservation and guest details
Create service to generate unique confirmation numbers for reservations
Implement email service to send reservation confirmations to guests

subtasks.summary: Write unit tests for reservation logic
subtasks.description: Create JUnit tests for reservation creation and validation

stories.description:
As a system, I want to prevent double bookings by validating room availability before confirming reservations so that rooms are not overbooked.

Acceptance Criteria:
- System checks room availability before accepting reservation
- Prevents booking of rooms already reserved for overlapping dates
- Prevents booking of rooms marked as under maintenance
- Displays clear error message when room is unavailable
- Locks room during reservation process to prevent race conditions
- Validates check-in date is not in the past

subtasks.description: Create service to validate room availability for date range with overlap detection
Create database locking mechanism to prevent concurrent booking conflicts
Implement validation to prevent booking of rooms under maintenance

subtasks.summary: Write unit tests for validation logic
subtasks.description: Create comprehensive JUnit tests for all validation scenarios

epics.description: Epic to handle guest check-in and check-out processes with automatic room status updates.

stories.description:
As a front desk staff member, I want to check in guests with confirmed reservations so that their room status is updated and they can access their room.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Staff can search reservations by confirmation number or guest name
- System verifies guest identity and reservation details
- Cannot check in before reservation start date
- Room status automatically changes from 'Reserved' to 'Occupied'
- Check-in time is recorded in the system
- Guest receives room key/access card information
- System displays any special requests or notes for the reservation

subtasks.description: Implement REST API for guest check-in with reservation validation
Create service to search reservations by confirmation number or guest name
Create frontend interface for check-in process with reservation lookup
Create service to automatically update room status during check-in

subtasks.summary: Write unit tests for check-in logic
subtasks.description: Create JUnit tests for check-in validation and status updates

stories.description:
As a front desk staff member, I want to check out guests and settle their bills so that rooms become available for new reservations.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Staff can initiate check-out for occupied rooms
- System calculates total bill including room charges and extras
- Standard check-out time is 12:00 PM
- Late check-out after 12:00 PM incurs additional charges
- Room status automatically changes from 'Occupied' to 'Available'
- Check-out time is recorded in the system
- Final bill is generated and presented to guest
- Payment must be settled before check-out completion

subtasks.description: Implement REST API for guest check-out with bill calculation
Create service to calculate additional charges for late check-out
Create frontend interface for check-out process with bill display
Create service to update room status to available after check-out

subtasks.summary: Write unit tests for check-out logic
subtasks.description: Create JUnit tests for check-out process and charge calculations

epics.description: Epic to handle billing calculations, payment processing, and record keeping.

stories.description:
As a system, I want to automatically calculate the total stay cost based on room type, duration, and additional services so that accurate bills are generated.

Acceptance Criteria:
- System calculates room charges based on room type and number of nights
- System includes additional service charges (room service, minibar, etc.)
- System applies applicable taxes
- System calculates late check-out charges if applicable
- Bill breakdown shows itemized charges
- Total amount is clearly displayed
- Bill is generated in printable format

subtasks.description: Design and implement database tables for billing and charges
Create service to calculate total charges including room, services, and taxes
Create service to generate itemized bills in printable format

subtasks.summary: Write unit tests for billing calculations
subtasks.description: Create JUnit tests for all billing calculation scenarios

stories.description:
As a front desk staff member, I want to record guest payments with payment method and status so that all financial transactions are tracked.

Acceptance Criteria:
- System supports multiple payment methods (Cash, Credit Card, Debit Card, UPI)
- Staff can record payment amount and method
- System validates payment amount matches bill total
- Payment status is updated (Paid, Partial, Pending)
- Payment receipt is generated
- All payment records are stored for audit purposes
- Payment timestamp is recorded

subtasks.description: Design and implement database tables for payment records
Create REST API endpoint to record payment details and status
Create frontend interface for recording payments with method selection
Create service to generate payment receipts

subtasks.summary: Write unit tests for payment logic
subtasks.description: Create JUnit tests for payment recording and validation

epics.description: Epic to handle reservation cancellations with policy-based charge calculations.

stories.description:
As a front desk staff member, I want to cancel reservations and apply cancellation charges according to hotel policy so that cancellations are handled consistently.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Staff can search and select reservations to cancel
- System displays cancellation policy and applicable charges
- Cancellation charges are calculated based on time before check-in
- Room status is updated to 'Available' after cancellation
- Cancellation confirmation is generated
- Refund amount is calculated (if applicable)
- Cancellation record is maintained for audit
- Email notification is sent to guest about cancellation

subtasks.description: Implement configurable cancellation policy rules and charge structure
Create service to calculate cancellation charges based on policy
Implement REST API for reservation cancellation with charge calculation
Create frontend interface for cancellation with policy display
Create service to calculate refund amounts after cancellation charges
Implement email service to send cancellation confirmations

subtasks.summary: Write unit tests for cancellation logic
subtasks.description: Create JUnit tests for cancellation and charge calculations
